original_text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
generated_text:
1. "The new superhero movie has the same over-the-top action as the Marvel franchise, but it feels more exhausting on the big screen and induces eye-rolling more frequently."
2. "The new sci-fi film has the same predictable plot as the Star Wars series, but it takes longer to get to the point and induces boredom more slowly."
3. "The new horror movie has the same jump scares as the Paranormal Activity franchise, but it builds up tension more slowly and induces anxiety more gradually."
4. "The new action movie has the same loud explosions as the Fast and Furious franchise, but it feels more overwhelming on the big screen and induces fatigue more quickly."
